resources.string: CircularProgressBar by Lopez Mikhael which can be found here
CircularProgressBar by Lopez Mikhael is licensed under a Apache License 2.0. Based on a work at Pedramrn/CircularProgressBar.
The Settings Icon used is by Material Design and is licensed under Apache License 2.0. It can be found here
The Hourglass image used is by Julia Osadcha
I\'m currently a student but will update the app whenever possible. For suggestions,improvements and bug fixes, send an email to:
